overview:
A creative facilitator, Babette focuses on engaging right brain and left brain, technical and non-technical, cross-functional professionals in collaborative business development discussion. It’s not enough to facilitate: the goal is to achieve “aha!” moments which propel collaborative relationships beyond the short term tactical nature of projects. Babette Ten Haken was recently described as “sneezing ideas.”

Babette Ten Haken works with mature as well as entrepreneurial companies, in the industrial manufacturing and high tech arenas. Business planning and modeling, and core value modeling, are at the core of her skill sets.
